name: GIVE HOPE TO A DOG foundation
goal: Management of shelter for homeless animals, fighting against animal cruelty, spay/neuter, vaccination, deworming and treatment of stray animals and animals in need, feeding of stray animals, organisation of permanent and foster homes, conducting of lectures, seminars, tutorials in order of humanization of the relationship of population to stray animals, encouraging youth volunteers activity, promoting social integration and personal fulfillment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: Limitation of stray animals population in Bulgaria, castration and vaccinations of stray cats and dogs, finding permanent home for strays, raising funds for shelters and fosters.
